title: Kani Miran, Urmia
text: Kani Miran (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Kānī Mīrān) is a village in <a href="Sumay-ye%20Jonubi%20Rural%20District">Sumay-ye Jonubi Rural District</a>, <a href="Sumay-ye%20Beradust%20District">Sumay-ye Beradust District</a>, <a href="Urmia%20County">Urmia County</a>, <a href="West%20Azerbaijan%20Province">West Azerbaijan Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 206, in 32 families.
